value.title: How to show 5 minute intervals in Power BI?
value.excerpt: Another question from the comments...  MrTavelBlog wanted to know how to show 5 minute intervals in Power BI. Patrick accepts the challenge and shows you how! value.title: Is a parameter filtered in Power BI Paginated Reports???

Adam shows you a way you can find out!  Create and use the paginated report visual https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-bi/visuals/paginated-report-visual

value.title: Power BI Reports and Buttons (new with Power BI Desktop - April 2018)

value.title: Power BI Tutorial: 4 Ways To Get Data
value.excerpt: In this Power BI tutorial, Adam looks at 4 ways to get data in Power BI. This focuses on Power BI Desktop and the main storage modes - Import, DirectQuery and Live Connections to Analysis Services. If you are new to Power BI, be sure to check out this Power BI Tutorial: 4 ways to get data.   Import (Excel)
